alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Chicot, Sunflower, northern Washington and Bolivar Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near White River National Wildlife Refuge to near Dermott. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Beulah around 1235 AM CDT. Deeson around 1240 AM CDT. Pace, Scott and Lamont around 1245 AM CDT. Greenville, Duncan and Winterville around 1250 AM CDT. Cleveland, Mound Bayou, Metcalfe, Renova, Boyle, Merigold and Alligator around 1255 AM CDT. Ruleville around 110 AM CDT. Indianola, Shaw, Drew and Holly Ridge around 115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Halley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
